p1: This diagram shows the number of installations or monthly active users (MAU) per messaging app.
p2: Each bar represents one entity. Different colors indicate a grouping across several segments.
p3: Monthly active users (MAU) are an indicator for the user base and level of activity, mainly used in the context of advertising. Each company might have a different way (and reason) to measure it. But the numbers we researched from 2020/21 still give a sense of the reach and relevance of each service in the market.
p4: Installs give us a sense of popularity or interest for an app among users. Right now we only have numbers from the Google PlayStore, but since most devices use the Google operating system Android, this number gives us a good sense of market shares as well.
